channel.title: HELP URGENT how do i place a npc make it stay there and talk
channel.description:
I need to know how to place a npc on my private server (rite now it is blank) and i want for it to stay there and you can talk to it for example:
my starting place is lumbridge and i want a man there who says (welcome to blitzscape)
help please

item.title: HELP URGENT how do i place a npc make it stay there and talk
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh pkerjosh
item.description:
@pkerjosh wrote:

thanks it worked and it is in a 317 server

Read full topic
item.source: HELP URGENT how do i place a npc make it stay there and talk

item.title: HELP URGENT how do i place a npc make it stay there and talk
item.dc:creator: @Ashton51 Ashton51
item.description:
@Ashton51 wrote:

ugh,

seriously people these days seem so helpless…

do i really have to baby you?

fine here,

first serch for if(NPCID
and you will find all your npc dialouges, under the first one, or any one, add

if(NPCID == ####) { NpcDialouge = @@@; NpcDialogueSend = false; }

the #### is obviously the npc id

the @@@@ is the case number
then search for

public void UpdateNPCChat

Under that will be all the npc dialouge eg case 1, case 2, etc etc

find the last case and take that number and add 1

so if your last case is 130 then type

case 131: talk("Text goes here", ####); break;

and again the #### is the npc id head that will show in the dialouge

Read full topic
item.source: HELP URGENT how do i place a npc make it stay there and talk

item.title: HELP URGENT how do i place a npc make it stay there and talk

item.description:
@demonlover14 wrote:

[quote=“Ashton51, post:5, topic:338160”]317 or 508?

in 317 you can edit and create new dialouges in your client.java[/quote]
Wrong. . .
He’s asking HOW once again…
After he has spawned the npc in .cfg.
He would go to the npchandler.java and edidt it in their for it to talk.
